main.name: Haizhou Guo
main.bio: Come from financial background, and find myself in tech industry. I am passionate on programming, data, web applications, user interface and all technologes.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: A Full Stack Bootcamp with a passion of preparing students for real life aspects of a job in web development. Conceptualize, implement, and test web applications using various languages and frameworks. Effectively operated in an AGILE software environment team.

work.title: Equity Trader
work.description: Execute trades in accordance with firm policy and according to all regulatory rules and procedures. Evaluate financial risk, make decisions and prepare reports. Perform detailed analysis on market data.
